charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS; Conspiracy to Distribute 5 kilos or more of Cocaine(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 168 months on each of counts 1, 2 &; 3, all such terms are to run concurrently. Upon release from the Bureau of Prisons, Defendant shall be on Supervised Release for 5 years on Count 1 and 3 years on each of Counts 2 &; 3, all such terms to run concurrently. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00 on each of Counts 1, 2 &; 3, for a total of $300.00. Fine is waived

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Distribution of Cocaine(2s-3s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 168 months on each of counts 1, 2 &; 3, all such terms are to run concurrently. Upon release from the Bureau of Prisons, Defendant shall be on Supervised Release for 5 years on Count 1 and 3 years on each of Counts 2 &; 3, all such terms to run concurrently. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00 on each of Counts 1, 2 &; 3, for a total of $300.00. Fine is waived.
Statistically dismissed as Superceding Indictment filed.

charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS; Conspiracy to Distribute 5 kilos or more of Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to a term of 80 months in the Bureau of Prisons. Upon his release, Defendant shall be placed on Supervised Release for a term of 5 years. Defendant shall pay a fine in the amount of $200.00 and a special assessment in the amount of $100.00.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Possession with Intent to Distribute Cocaine(4)
